data.text:
About the Gajak

When someone talks about Gajak, the first name that comes to our minds is MORENA's famous GAJAK !! Delight food brings to you the world's best and the most famous Gajak straight to your doorsteps. Made from purified jaggery (Gur), pure desi ghee, sesame seeds (Til), cloves (Laung), cardamom (Elaichi), cashewnuts and pista with a method of preparation which is time consuming. It takes about 10–15 hours to prepare 5–8 kilograms of gajaks. The dough is hammered until all the sesame seeds break down and release their oils into the dough.

This winter enjoy eating some healthy snacks like Til Ki Gajak. Made by pounding roasted sesame seeds in a thick syrup of Jaggery or sugar this sweet is especially consumed in this season. So, grab your plate of this healthy winter sweet now.

Made of jaggery and sesame seeds, gajak provides energy to the body and prevents fatigue. The good amount of fibre in gajak helps improve digestion.
